Reviews.Author: Kayla Santiago
Reviews.Content: This is just what i wanted. it's light, it's small enough to just put in my purse and go. I love it. The wait was worth it. This was my first big electronic purchase through amazon, and I don't regret it at all.
Reviews.Title: I've never had a tablet before..

Reviews.Author: Mariko
Reviews.Content: It runs out the battery fast. And it works less than two hours. Sometimes it's powered off without warning. And also while charging, it doesn't work.
Reviews.Title: Hard to use

Reviews.Author: Kearra
Reviews.Content: It worked great for the first day or two then started freezing and restarting itself. after a few days of that it qui working all together and would only show the android screen... needless to say it hadto be returned....to. be ret
Reviews.Title: bad product

Reviews.Author: reinaldo
Reviews.Content: Excelent product according to the price ,my kids are happy  they downloding free games and free aplications . I m happy.
Reviews.Title: excelente!!

Reviews.Author: Andrea
Reviews.Content: Reasonable price for this tablet including options. Easy to use, see and navigate system.  A great tablet for personal or gift.
Reviews.Title: Perfect tablet for anyone.

Reviews.Author: B White
Reviews.Content: Although we thought this was going to be a decent device, we had to return it shortly after purchase as it froze up.  Bummer
Reviews.Title: Don't buy it

Reviews.Author: james
Reviews.Content: FAIL!. Very poor screen quality. Careful! It scratches very easily. Tablet now refuses to boot. I have had it for only 31/2 weeks. It was not dropped.
Reviews.Title: FAIL!

Reviews.Author: Amy Kim
Reviews.Content: Kind of slow working. Not all the apps in Google play is compatible with the device. We just ended up using an external website but still...You get what you pay for.
Reviews.Title: Slow

ProductInfo.Features:
Allwinner A13 1.2 GHz 7 inch capacitive Touchscreen Android 4.0 OS.RAM DDR3 512M ROM 4GB.
Dual Cameras Front 0.3MP Back 0.3MP Support WIFI, 4 way gravity-sensor, flash player 11.1.
Built in 4GB memory and support MICRO SD/TF card up to 32GB which allows enough space to download freely.
Portable and super slim design 5-points multi-touch capacitive touch screen for convenient operation.
Wi-Fi (802.11 a/b/g/n),2300mAh Battery for longer usage time.Skype video chat, HD games ,Netflix Movies
ProductInfo.Name: AFUNTA 7-Inch Allwinner A13 Q88+ Dual Camera Tablet Pc Android 4.0 1.2GHz CPU Multiple Touch Capactive Screen 512MB RAM 4GB HDD Wifi (White)
